name: Easy Pizza Dough
steps: Dissolve yeast in ¼ cup warm water. When dissolved, add yeast mixture and 1 cup water to dry ingredients in bowl.
Mix until dough is formed. Knead well. Let rise until double in size. Put pizza in pans and work out thin. (2 rounds)
Mix tomato sauce with Italian seasonings and spread over crust. Sprinkle with mozzarella or parmesan
cheese, pepperoni, ham, pineapple, olives, and more cheese. Bake at 425 degrees for 15-­‐20 minutes
